ygData.subject: RE: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: This must be why at L35 a few weeks ago I was stuck at 100 Hmm Lx5 - 13 35x5 - 13 162 max.....  Nope wrong, I spent 1000 pp on it trying to make Stalking
ygData.messageBody:
This must be why at L35 a few weeks ago I was stuck at 100

Hmm Lx5 - 13
35x5 - 13
162 max..... Nope wrong, I spent 1000 pp on it trying to make Stalking
Probes only to discover the cap....


Not lets see again....
(L - 15) x 5
(35 - 15) x 5
100 max..... Seems to be exactly where I was stuck.....

Vapn, L36 Gnome Warrior (102 Tinkering since hitting L36, hmm it went up off
a few attempts relative to the last try at L35)


I think the post below is wrong, unless something has changed very recently.

-----Original Message-----
From: Diablokilr@... [mailto:Diablokilr@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 7:55 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: SV: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Skill Cap


From: Diablokilr@...

Ok I'm only going to say this one more time.... the tinker skill formula
is

Level x 5 - 13

THE END!!!!!
